channel.title: Someone pleaseeeeee help meeeee!
channel.description:
Ok, so I got my server running and crap, but there are some things I don't know at all. I have looked and looked and hopefully someone here can help me. I will list out the issues and questions.
1.)During research: I came on here and went to download files and stuff. I clicked on the moparscape 4.1 forum link and it in then turned me to the play moparscape link. Before that, there was a "start programming" link that I clicked on. It then opened a download window which i downloaded to my "downloads" folder on my computer. The folder contained 2 server .jar files and 2 client .jar files, as well as the moparscape.jar file. There were 2 text files and another folder called META_INF. Then, I started up my server through no-ip and port forwarded and all that jazz. I started playing and testing characters, but all of them were "owners". So I didn't know how to change character rights. I then found another folder under my users called ".moparscape", which included a "servers" folder that had a characters folder in it, of which I could change the rights of new characters. After playing for a bit, logging in and out and stuff, it started saying like "account allready logged in" and crap. I fixed it but don't remember. question:
Question: When moparscape opens, do I need to click on new server under the file menu, then hit start server? Do I just log in? How do I prevent that error of "account allready logged in".
2.) What files do I edit in order to effect my in game features? Do I need to add .java files into the folder with the characters options? Or do I put it in the folder I downloaded when I went to that website above? What files do I edit and where do I access them from?
3.) The number 2 problem is really important, I need to know how to change the game. Like changing the spawn point, adding teleports, mini games, just in-game features. PLEASE ANSWER THAT ONE.
4.) Do I need a compile file and a run file? if so where do I put it? WHERE WHERE WHERE. that is my main issue, where to find things, and if I need to add them?
-Bob Matt

item.title: Someone pleaseeeeee help meeeee!
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

lol…but anyways 1. i dont get wat u asking 2.yes u need to add java files for minigames and shit then make it all work 3.search the coords then change em at client.java or w/e it is for me its in config so idk 4. WTF?

Read full topic

item.title: Someone pleaseeeeee help meeeee!
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.description:
@mawang wrote:

Ok, so I got my server running and crap, but there are some things I don’t know at all. I have looked and looked and hopefully someone here can help me. I will list out the issues and questions.

1.)During research: I came on here and went to download files and stuff. I clicked on the moparscape 4.1 forum link and it in then turned me to the play moparscape link. Before that, there was a “start programming” link that I clicked on. It then opened a download window which i downloaded to my “downloads” folder on my computer. The folder contained 2 server .jar files and 2 client .jar files, as well as the moparscape.jar file. There were 2 text files and another folder called META_INF. Then, I started up my server through no-ip and port forwarded and all that jazz. I started playing and testing characters, but all of them were “owners”. So I didn’t know how to change character rights. I then found another folder under my users called “.moparscape”, which included a “servers” folder that had a characters folder in it, of which I could change the rights of new characters. After playing for a bit, logging in and out and stuff, it started saying like “account allready logged in” and crap. I fixed it but don’t remember. question:

Question: When moparscape opens, do I need to click on new server under the file menu, then hit start server? Do I just log in? How do I prevent that error of “account allready logged in”.

2.) What files do I edit in order to effect my in game features? Do I need to add .java files into the folder with the characters options? Or do I put it in the folder I downloaded when I went to that website above? What files do I edit and where do I access them from?

3.) The number 2 problem is really important, I need to know how to change the game. Like changing the spawn point, adding teleports, mini games, just in-game features. PLEASE ANSWER THAT ONE.

4.) Do I need a compile file and a run file? if so where do I put it? WHERE WHERE WHERE. that is my main issue, where to find things, and if I need to add them?

-Bob Matt
